### Invitation to Qualify: Phase 2 - Immigration Holding Centre (IHC) Gate Replacement

#### Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the replacement of the main perimeter gates at the Immigration Holding Centre (IHC) located at 13130 76th Avenue, Surrey, BC.

#### Background

The IHC is a secure facility that requires the replacement of its main perimeter gates to ensure the safety and security of its staff and detainees. The gates are located at the 76th Avenue entrance and are approximately 70% of the total work scope. The replacement of the gates will include the demolition of the existing gates, structural foundation work, electrical power, and security system installations, as well as paving remediation. The work will be carried out in phases to ensure the security of the perimeter is not compromised.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Demolition of the existing gates
* Structural foundation work for the new gates
* Electrical power and security system installations
* Paving remediation
